message: Hello Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product to you. This unique offering has the potential to significantly enhance your business operations and bring substantial value to your organization. Given its exceptional capabilities and the benefits it can provide, we are confident in its worth of over $1500000. Considering its high value and the benefits it offers, we kindly propose an initial price of $2000000 for this exclusive opportunity.

Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer and the value of your product. However, given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet the proposed price of $2000000. I would like to make a counteroffer at $1500000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations and we can move forward with the transaction.

Thank you for your response, Bob. We understand your budgetary considerations and respect your decision. In light of this, we would like to make a counteroffer at $1750000 for our flagship product. This price reflects the value we believe the product brings to your business while remaining competitive within your budget constraints.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my current budget, I would like to counteroffer at $1600000. I hope this proposal is acceptable and we can finalize the transaction.

We appreciate your effort in negotiating, Bob. Considering the value of our product and your feedback, we are willing to accept a counteroffer of $1650000 for our flagship product. We believe this price aligns well with both our valuation of the product and your budgetary constraints.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of your product and appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget, I would like to counteroffer at $1625000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations and we can move forward with the transaction.
